{"step_by_step_thinking": "In a dataset, the first quartile (Q1) represents the 25th percentile of the data, the second quartile (Q2) represents the 50th percentile or median, and the third quartile (Q3) represents the 75th percentile. The fourth quartile would represent the 100th percentile. The question asks for the number of patients between the 3rd and 4th quartile, which is the top 25% of the data. Since the total number of patients is 200, 25% of 200 is 50.", "answer_choice": "B"}
